Status.description: The status of the tracking category or option.

TrackingCategoryID.description: The unique ID of the tracking category.

Option.description: The tracking option associated with the category.

TrackingCategoryName.description: The name of the tracking category.

TrackingOptionID.description: The unique ID of the tracking option.

TrackingOptionName.description: The name of the tracking option.

IsActive.description: Specifies if the tracking option is currently active.

IsDeleted.description: Specifies if the tracking option has been deleted.

TrackingOptionID.description: The unique ID of the tracking option.

IsArchived.description: Indicates if the tracking option is archived.

Status.description: The status of the tracking option.

Name.description: The name of the tracking option.

HasValidationErrors.description: Indicates if there are validation errors for the option.

Name.description: The name of the tracking category or option.
